.
Example 2:  Time Limit to Furnish Amended Income Information to Increase Rate
Situation
:
A Veteran’s initial year is November 15, 2021, through November 30, 2022.
The Veteran previously reported receipt of $500 nonrecurring income on April 1, 2022.
The nonrecurring income was counted for a 12-month period from May 1, 2022, through April 30, 2023.
Result
:  The Veteran has up to and including December 31, 2023, to submit satisfactory evidence that the amount of nonrecurring income received on April 1, 2022, was less than $500.
